meanings.definition: A type of synthetic material used in making records and clothing.
meanings.sent1: I bought some new vinyls to add to my record collection.
meanings.sent2: The store sells various vinyls for crafting and sewing projects.
meanings.sent3: My friend tried to wear vinyls in the rain, and they ended up sticking to him!
meanings.sent4: Her love for vinyls was like a colorful tapestry woven into her life.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh vinyls always reminds me of my grandmother's sewing room.

meanings.definition: Plural form of vinyl, referring to multiple vinyl records or pieces of vinyl material.
meanings.sent1: I own a collection of vintage vinyls from the 70s.
meanings.sent2: The DJ played a mix of classic vinyls at the party.
meanings.sent3: The room was so full of vinyls that it looked like a music museum!
meanings.sent4: The stack of vinyls on the shelf was a tower of musical memories.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the needle hitting the vinyls was music to my ears.
